title: Add admin username/password login with specified credentials

requirements.text: Add a separate Admin Sign-In option that authenticates using a username and password (in addition to the existing Internet Identity admin sign-in flow), using these initial credentials exactly: username/id = "adminumar" and password = "umar9945".

quotes: make admin login user id and password as mantioning ID-adminumar, password- umar9945

acceptanceCriteria: The Admin Sign-In page provides a username/id + password form.
Submitting username "adminumar" with password "umar9945" successfully signs the user into the admin area (/app/admin).
Submitting any other username/password combination shows an English error message and does not grant admin access.
The existing Internet Identity-based admin sign-in flow continues to work as it does today.

requirements.text: Implement backend support for verifying the admin username/password and establishing an admin-authenticated session state that the frontend can use for route protection and for calling admin-only backend methods.

quotes: make admin login user id and password as mantioning ID-adminumar, password- umar9945

acceptanceCriteria: There is a backend method that validates the submitted username/password and returns a success/failure response.
After successful username/password login, admin-only routes are accessible and admin-only backend methods can be called successfully from the frontend.
After unsuccessful username/password login, admin-only routes remain blocked.

requirements.text: Persist the admin username/password authentication configuration across canister upgrades with the initial default values set to username/id "adminumar" and password "umar9945".

quotes: make admin login user id and password as mantioning ID-adminumar, password- umar9945

acceptanceCriteria: After upgrading the canister, the configured admin username/password login still works with the same credentials.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Use English for any user-facing text.
Preserve the exact provided credentials as the initial configured admin login: username/id "adminumar", password "umar9945".
nonGoals: Do not remove or replace the existing Internet Identity authentication flow for normal users.
Do not add third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Do not introduce additional backend services or external databases.
